<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dragon Transformation](/Feats.aspx?ID=172) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=127" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 93 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[dragon instinct](/Instincts.aspx?ID=2); [Dragon's Rage Wings](/Feats.aspx?ID=162)

</column>

---

You transform into a ferocious Large dragon, gaining the effects of 6th-level [_dragon form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=88) except that you use your own AC and attack modifier, you apply your extra damage from [Rage](/Actions.aspx?ID=3), and the Breath Weapon uses your class DC. The action to Dismiss the transformation gains the [rage](/Traits.aspx?ID=135) trait.

 At 18th level, you gain a +20-foot status bonus to your fly Speed, your damage bonus with dragon Strikes increases to +12, and you gain a +14 status bonus to your breath weapon damage.
name: Dragon Transformation
